csc2a.model

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • csc2a.model.GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    iRenderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bomb, Bomb2, Coin, Door, Player, Space, Stone

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements iRenderable
    The class from which all of your game objects must inherit Extend this class for all of your custom game objects
    Author:
    Mr Greaves
